  • Methodendetails

    • connect

      public void connect()
      Connect to broker. The broker address should be set with setBroker() before connecting.

    • subscribe

      public void subscribe(String topic)
      Subscribes to a given topic.
      Parameter:
      topic - Topic to subscribe to.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(String mpu_topic, String temp_topic)
      Unsubscribe from default topic (please unsubscribe from further topics prior to calling this function).

    • publish

      public void publish(String topic, String msg)
      Publishes a message via MQTT (with fixed topic).
      Parameter:
      topic - topic to publish with.
      msg - message to publish with publish topic.

    • setBroker

      public void setBroker(String brokerAddress)
      Sets the brokerAddress to the given String.
      Parameter:
      brokerAddress - The brokerAddress.
